General.Text: An officer has spotted a vehicle that fled from a traffic stop earlier. Talk to him first.

D_Officer.Dialogue: Hey buddy, nice to see you! Looks like you've grown yourself quite a nice belly, huh?
Anyways, I have spotted this vehicle right here, which fled from us earlier.
The suspect has to be around, we only know he is a white male.
I assume he is going in the shopping mall, he's probably hungry.
